quizCards.back:
$$
\lim_{ x\to *}(lnA -lnB)=\lim_{ x\to *}ln(\frac AB)=0????\lim_{ x\to *}\frac{ln A}{ln B}=1?????
$$

$$
\sqrt[n]{n}=\sqrt[n]{\sqrt n\times\sqrt n\times 1\times ...\times 1}\leq \frac{\sqrt n+\sqrt n + n - 2}{n}=1 - \frac{2}{n} + \frac{2}{\sqrt n} < 1+\frac {2} {\sqrt n}\rightarrow \sqrt[n]{n}-1<\frac2{\sqrt n}<\epsilon
$$

quizCards.front: §Õ??x^u, lnx, e^x, log_a x, a^x, sinx, cosx, sec^2 x, csc^2 x, secxtanx, cscxcotx?????????
quizCards.back:
$EXTERNAL$$$
\int x^\mu dx = \frac{x^{\mu+1}}{\mu+1}+C\\
\int e^xdx = e^x+C\\
\int a^xdx =\frac{a^x}{lna}+C\\
\int \frac1x=lnx +C\\
\int \\
\int sinxdx = -cosx+C\\
\int cosxdx = sinx+C\\
\int sec^2xdx=tanx+C\\
\int csc^2xdx=-cotx+C\\
\int secxtanxdx = secx +C\\
\int cscxcotx=-cscx+C\\
$$

$EXTERNAL$$$
\begin{align}
\int \frac{1+sinx}{1+cosx}e^xdx&=\int\frac{sin^2\frac x2+sin\frac x2cos\frac x2 + cos^2\frac x2}{2cos^2\frac x2}e^xdx\\&=\int (tan^2\frac x2+tan\frac x2 + 1)e^xd\frac x2
\\&=\frac12\int(sec^2\frac x2+tan\frac x2)de^x
\\&=\frac12(e^xsec^2\frac x2 - \int e^xtan\frac x2dx+\int e^xtan\frac x2dx)=\frac12 e^xsec^2\frac x2+C

\end{align}
$$

$$
\int sinxdx=-cosx+C
\\\int cosdx=sinx+C
\\\int tanxdx=-ln|cosx|+C
\\\int cotxdx=ln|sinx|+C
\\\int secxdx=ln|secx+tanx|+C
\\\int cscxdx=ln|cscx-cotx|+C
\\\int sec^2xdx=tanx+C
\\\int csc^2xdx=-cotx+C
$$
